title: The Hellbound Heart - Clive Barker [Unabridged][Rare]
description:
The Hellbound Heart 
               - Clive Barker [Rare Audiobook] -

The Hellbound Heart is a horror novella by Clive Barker. It was the basis for the movie Hellraiser. It was originally published in 1986 by Dark Harvest in the third volume of their Night Visions anthology series (the volume also included seven short stories by Ramsey Campbell and three by Lisa Tuttle) but was re-released as a stand-alone title by HarperCollins in 1988 after the success of the movie. Unabridged.
